name: Highway Traffic Moto Challenge
description:
In this real bike racing game you need to give race on super crazy highway with full speed. Become crazy motor bike super real hero of the highway for redemption. Many challenges are waiting for you on the highway redemption racing road with 3D simulation graphics.

Not only bike racing, although you can be the crazy shooter super real hero, you can attack your enemy with super modern weapon to be a motorbike monster, you can kill the entire enemy who are coming your way to attack you, shoot them with your super real 3D gun.

Game Features :
- Smooth Controls
- Excellent sounds and graphics
- Realistic bike physics and handling!
- Console quality 3D graphics
- Fast paced, intense game play
- Realistic sound environment
